1.content: Which of the twins will you choose to be? Keep in mind this will alter the characters they interact with, and whoever is chosen to be small the other twin will end up being normal sized/titanic to their smaller sibling.
1.title: The Tiny Two

choices: It's a school day and Alex is taking him to class
Some friends want to hang out
11.content: Grumbling, hands reached out into the darkness. Rumbles beyond comparison echoed high above and far away and all around at the same time. Luckily they weren't deafening. Yet. What was going on?
11.title: The Small Son

choices: "I'm going sunbathing, and I could use a little tanning buddy."
"We got an appointment, remember? 'Nother checkup at the docs."
111.content:
"Hey, c'mon kid, time to get up." A voice called from the heavens, thunderous, feminine, a bit on the slow-mo side from its sheer magnitude, taking a few moments to reach your ears. It jolted you awake, but you tried to fight it and return to the realm of sleep.

"Noooo...."

"Was that a 'no', little man?"

"Noooo......!"

"Come on, I don't want ya to end up with bruises like last time. You know it's a little hard for me to pick you up when I'm still reeling into sobriety after waking up." A thud slammed down far, far away, sounding like a 'click' of a fingernail hitting something.

"Fiiine..." You grumble, sitting up and rubbing your eyes. "Could've let me sleep at least a couple more hours, Calpernia..."

"It's one in the afternoon." The sultry, booming voice echoed from high above, each vowel deafened by the sheer magnitude and the distance between the source of the goddess's voice and you. You sit up, stretching and yawning, gazing high, high above, the enormous shadow of some vast figure looming, so massive you couldn't take in all of it, only blurry fractions here and there. You looked out and around your 'bed', while in actuality it was simply a thread of clothing fiber, so thick it was like a plain to you.

"Don't have much to do..." You retort by yelling up with all of your might, always hating to strain your voice so but you were used to it by now.

"Course ya do." The enormity shifted, revealing the glorious sky of a woman's face staring down, some of her white-blonde hairs like gigantic pillars spilling over and slamming down with erupting force nearby, their impact making you jump in the air slightly. She huffed, a fog of greyish-black clouds like an oncoming storm blotting out her face. Really had to convince her to stop smoking one of these days.

"Fine." You crossed your homes. "What's so important ya had to wake me up from my beauty sleep?" You joked.

Calpernia snickered and rolled her eyes, and even though you couldn't see it, you could hear it, like a thousand rollercoasters going off in the distance. "Well, wise-guy, today..."
111.title: Woken by Calpernia

choices: "My nipple's a lil linty, stupid bra."
"Got some gunk in between my toes ya could look at."
"There's something stuck in my teeth...what? I won't swallow!"
1111.content:
You groaned, rubbing your hand over your face. You knew what 'cleaning' meant. It was mostly Calpernia's joke as a means to play with you or just get you off your lazy ass, but what else could you do? Not much else given how small you were. Sure, you did have some stuff your size, like clothing and even somehow a laptop (science is incredible, isn't it?) but really you didn't do much with it.

"What am I cleaning today, Cal?"

She cracked a grin, lips splitting into a thousand-mile wide smirk.
1111.title: "Yer gonna help me 'clean'."

choices: You do the deed without any trouble
11113.content:
"There's something stuck in my teeth... what? I won't swallow!"

You instantly regretted asking. "No way, I'm not going in there..." you indicated her mouth. Whilst you definitely appreciated everything she had done for you over the years, few things were less appealing than going inside her mouth.

"Come on, I promised I wouldn't swallow!" she countered, as if that made everything okay.

"You saying that doesn't fill me with confidence. Besides, it's not being swallowed that I'm worried about... it's the smell. You smoke a lot, so it's not exactly going to be pleasant."

"Bad breath? You're worried about bad breath? Boy, get in there!" she practically ordered, opening her mouth as if to devour you.

She lowered you past her red lips and onto her slimy tongue, where you were instantly hit by the stench of her breath. Then the tongue moved erratically as her voice boomed. "IT'S WAY IN THE BACK THERE, ON THE RIGHT. MY RIGHT THAT IS!"

"Yeah, maybe you should have said that before putting me in your mouth!" you responded, picking yourself off the floor. You figured you should get this done as quickly as possible. The smell of smoke lingered in the air as you began to trek to the mountainous molars at the back of Calpernia's mouth. At least she was leaving her mouth open slightly so as you could see.

As you made your way back there, you realised how crazy this whole ordeal was. All for a bit of food scrap stuck between her teeth... Though Calpernia gave her word she wouldn't swallow, it was definitely a real possibility now that you were in her mouth. You knew you'd survive the experience if it came to it, but a prolonged stay in Calpernia's stomach was not your idea of a nice time. You didn't even want to think about it.

Calpernia's tongue was like the surface of an alien world. The bumpy surface coated in moisture undulated under your feet. It was going to be some time before you reached the place she wanted you to check. Damn it, couldn't she have dropped you closer? This was probably payback for saying her breath smells. Being in her mouth really amplified the distinct smokey smell.This was not your first time inside of Calpernia though. You had been inside both ears several times, her nose exactly once (which was more than enough) and her mouth twice before today. You had never wanted to venture any deeper into her, or anyone else for that matter.

You became a bit more nervous when everything went dark due to Calpernia closing her mouth. What was she doing out there? You began to panic more as the tongue started to shift. Was she about to swallow?
11113.title: Cal-cium-pernia

111131.content:
The ground shifted beneath your feet. You heard the ominous swirling of saliva as it was pooling at the back of Calpernia's tongue. The tongue itself was tipping, causing you to slide down it at an alarming rate. "Calpernia, wait! Don't swallow!" You called out in vain. It was too late. You were caught in a deluge of sticky saliva and swept into her gaping gullet. There was a loud GULP as Calpernia swallowed you. You fell down her throat, calling out to her as you entered her esophagus.

Well this was a first. You hadn't been eaten by anyone before. You never thought it'd be Calpernia that did it. This was definitely going to be an interesting experience. Part of you was actually kind of glad and excited to see what it was like inside Calpernia's belly. Falling through her food pipe, you travelled down through her chest and into her belly.

You arrived in her stomach, dropping down into the gross remains of breakfast. The stench was atrocious and the heat staggering. You picked yourself off the mountain of sausage mush and looked around Calpernia's colossal stomach. It was gigantic beyond words. The noises of digestion drowned out practically everything else, but for Calpernia's heart beating up in her chest somewhere above.

Then there was a loud but muffled voice, unmistakably Calpernia's.

"OH NO... I SWALLOWED HIM! SORRY ALAN! BUT DON'T WORRY, YOU'LL BE SAFE INSIDE ME! IT JUST MIGHT TAKE A COUPLE OF DAYS BEFORE YOU COME OUT OF ME..."

You knew that was going to be the likeliest method of escape. You knew you were going to go all the way through Calpernia's digestive system... For now though, you were in the belly of the beast. Calpernia's stomach. Might as well have some fun with this situation, eh?
111131.title: Swallowed by Calpernia

choices: A bully takes him from Alex...
Alan ends up skipping class with Hayes
112.title: School Days School Daze

choices: Heather Miles, the most popular girl in school
Baxter Joyce, a jock who loves to torment the tiny teen
1122.title: A bully takes him from Alex...

11222.title: Baxter Joyce, a jock who loves to torment the t...

choices: Tessa, you'll be meeting her at her house
All of them! It's a day out together at the mall
113.title: Some friends want to hang out

choices: She's playing video games, but pauses to greet you
She's actually napping, so you're placed on her bedside table to wait
She's in the bathroom taking a bath, but oddly enough you're invited in...
1131.content:
You sat on a wasteland of skin, stretching out as far as the eye could see, the occasional deep canyon marring the perfectly pristine peachy world. Rumbles and quakes did occasionally happen, but they weren't minded. You sat atop of a mere fraction of a fingertip, your caretaker Calpernia carrying you to one of your friends house, Tessa Mac'Tir, quite the cutie of irish descent and basically who you considered your closest friend besides the big Cal herself.

The mammoth of a woman greeted Tessa's mother at the door and dropped you off, transitioning you onto Ms. Mac'Tir's own finger, making sure you were safe before departing. Through the home you were carried until eventually reaching Tessa's closed door.
1131.title: Tessa Time

choices: Alex is hanging out after school with Ms. Mckissick
Alan requires some help with homework, so she's helping him out
She's sneaking into the boys locker room, maybe she'll catch a glimpse of Ian?
Unfortunately, Saturday somehow gets her hands on Alex...
Aoi is coming over to hang out
12.content: Grumbling, hands reached out into the darkness. Rumbles beyond comparison echoed high above and far away and all around at the same time. Luckily they weren't deafening. Yet. What was going on?
12.title: The Small Daughter

choices: Before you can answer, you fall off Alan's shoulder.
122.content:
"Hey little sis! Can you please help me with my Trig homework? I need some help." Alan asked Alex as she was on her safety pin made into the world's smallest couch just for her. Alan's toes were like continents to Alex. Each of his pores were like condominiums to her. Although the smell of his feet were terrible. Alex grew to tolerate most stenches,having been exposed to them for her entire life.

"Sure thing. But don't call me "little" You know how I feel about my height!" Alex said grumbling.

"Whatever." Alan said as he squatted down to pluck her from her seat, and placing her on his shoulder.
After the homework help, Alan asked Alex "Okay, now sis, what do you want to do next?"...
122.title: Alan requires some help with homework, so she...

12212.content: Where on Alan is your room?
12212.title: On Alan's body

122121.content:
Being so small, your parents decided it would not only be best for your twin brother to look after you, but for him to let you live on him. You and Alan have decided that the best place for you to live on him is in his deep belly button. There you have enough room to put a mansion to your scale and still have about enough room to put two football stadiums next to one another. Besides being very spacious, the lint in his navel is abundant, so you had plenty of clothes, fabrics, and bedding from Alan's lint. The smell didn't get so bad either (not that it matters with your use of body oder). Your family even got you a lot of electronics, furniture, art, and other things to make you feel normal and cozy.

"Okay sis! To my belly button you go!" Alan said as he licked his index finger and places it on top of you. With you stuck on his finger, Alan pushed you all the way to the bottom of his belly button. You being used to it peeled yourself from the swirl of wrinkles and folds that is the bottom of his belly button.

"Thanks bro!" You responded. You continued to walk in the fleshy cave you know as both your brother's navel, as well as your room. You undressed and put your clothes in your hamper. Completely naked, you continued to walk to your wardrobe, taking out a pair of silky lint panties, fleece lint pj pants, and a cotton lint robe. You then jump onto the pile of lint you know as your own bed, ready to go to sleep.

But what does Alan, your brother and shelter do?
122121.title: Home in the belly button.

1221212.content:
Before long, you are woken from your sleep by a thunderous roaring sound and some kind of earthquake. You clamber from your lint bed and look around the enormous cavern. "Alan? What was that?"

Nothing.

"Al-" as you spoke, it came again. You were nearly thrown off your feet as the guttural roar resounded around you. You could swear you heard Alan groaning, as the walls of flesh rippled around you. Growing slightly concerned, you rushed out to the entrance of the belly button and called out to him."Alan!"

The roaring noise came again, from deep in Alan's belly. He lowered his enormous finger to his navel and let you climb aboard. Once you were on, he lifted his finger in front of his gigantic face, which loomed powerfully in the distance. "Sis... sorry, I don't feel so good."

"Yeah... I can't get to sleep down there, it's too noisy and everything is trembling all over the place." you explain, a little grumpy at having been woken and dealing with such a ruckus.

"I'm sorry. Must have been something I ate." Alan held his belly with his other hand, feeling the immense discomfort from within. "Something isn't right in there."

"I guess I'll just have to sleep somewhere else tonight."

"Well... that's one option."

You noticed his god-like face change it's expression. Another guttural rumble came from down in his stomach.

"Huh? Well what else am I gonna do?" you ask, curious as to what his alternative was.

"Go inside me and fix my stomach ache...?"

You were completely awestruck by this suggestion. Never had such a thought occurred to you and you never believed you'd hear such an idea from your brother.

"Go... inside you?" you utter aloud, watching him nod sheepishly. "Like... into your stomach?"

"You're small enough to go in and fix whatever is upsetting my stomach." he elaborated.

"If I have to go inside your stomach... that means you'd have to eat me." you continue to verbalize your train of thought.

"Well... yeah. I'll eat you and then you'll land in my stomach and can start looking for the problem. Once you've fixed it, you'll be able to go back to sleep and I'll feel a lot better."

You watched his giant mouth move as he spoke, observing it in a way you had never done in the past. You took a moment to compose yourself before you spoke again.

"Okay... so let me get this straight. I've got two choices. Either I sleep somewhere I'm not used to, probably out in the open and exposed to unknown danger, or... I take a trip down your throat and wander around in your belly looking for something I don't know how to fix...but I'd be safe, with you... or in you... and it's probably going to be really gross, but also... kind of cool. Um... okay. This is not how I thought my evening would go... Right. Okay, I've made my decision."

You watched his antsy expression change, his eyes flickering with a strange excitement. He spoke again.

"So... what's it gonna be sis?"
1221212.title: Tummy Trouble

12212122.content:
Steeling yourself, you tell your enormous twin brother the choice you've made..

"I'll go into your stomach."

His mile-wide smile said everything you needed to know. You would soon be going in through that mouth, on a journey into the grossest place currently imaginable - Alan's upset stomach.

"Good! Thanks sis, I really appreciate it."

With that said, he opened his black-hole of a mouth and moved his finger toward it. The closer you got the warmer you felt. Darkness fell as you were plunged into his maw and shaken from the ridges of his fingertip. You landed with a wet splat on the middle of his tongue, which seemed like an alien landscape at your nigh microscopic size. You watched his monolithic finger retract from the mouth and what little light you had vanish as he closed his mouth. You were overcome by his powerful breath, giving this new environment a very distinct atmosphere. The organic floor squelched beneath your feet as you tried to adjust to being inside Alan.

Before you could do much else, a great rush of saliva surrounded you and swept you into Alan's throat as he quickly swallowed you with a powerful gulp.

"Aaah. Down you go, good luck sis!" he said to his still gurgling belly.

Meanwhile you were falling through his esophagus, passing through his chest cavity as he said those words. All around you, the sounds of his breathing and heartbeat resonated powerfully. After a lengthy fall, you entered the rancid chamber of his gargantuan stomach. There, you fell further until you landed with a tiny splash in a sea of gastric juice and Alan's still digesting dinner.

You quickly surfaced in the gross, burbling pit of your brother's stomach, looking around for any sign of what might be causing his discomfort. It is dark, incredibly loud, extremely smelly and difficult to gather much information. There was a lot of activity, which was probably why Alan's belly was rumbling. You struggled through the gross swamp-like pit, clambering onto a (relatively) small island of partially digested food.

From there, you were able to get your bearings a little better. "Hmm... indigestion perhaps? That doesn't look right..."

You had noticed that part of the stomach was bubbling a lot, working away on something Alan had eaten earlier. Alan didn't seem to be digesting it very well, so you figured that was probably the cause of his tummy trouble. The entire stomach rumbled and you heard Alan groaning in discomfort, his voice echoing from above.

"OOOOHHHH.... MY STOMACH..."

You leaped into the stomach bile once more, swimming to the source of the disturbance. As you got closer, you found it harder to approach the problem food due to the bubbling liquids that surrounded it. The stench that surrounded this area was also way stronger. You circled around and decided to plow through the barrier of bubbles and gurgling stomach juice. It was rough going, but you were actually small enough to climb on the bubbles and approach the mushy island. Digging your hands into it's surface, you started to pull the thing apart piece by piece, breaking it down so that Alan can hopefully digest it more easily.

Once the mush was mostly torn apart, the stomach gave a prolonged groan and there was a powerful explosion of gas as Alan belched. The stomach seemed to calm down after that. Alan's voice came from above.
"THAT FEELS A LOT BETTER... OH YEAH. THANKS SIS!"

"Wow... I actually did it." you say to yourself, looking around Alan's stomach. "Now... how do I get out of here?"
12212122.title: Inside Job

122121222.content:
Alan answered “Actually, I’m just gonna let nature take its course and poo you out in the morning.” Alex did not like this at all. She does him a favor, and as a thank you, you are gonna become a piece of poo poo. She had been around a lot of smelly things, but this crossed the line. “You better let me out right now Alan!” Alex yelled, but Alan was fast asleep. Alex tried again, but everything started to funnel into the small intestine. The small intestine was very cramped, and Alex had spend it surrounded by last night’s dinner.


After a few hours, Alex was moved to the large intestine, which was a bit roomier, but now everything was less like food and more like poo poo.

Alan woke up and went to the bathroom to excrete his twin sister from his bowels. Alex, who was in the colon, could feel her brother get up and then sit down on toilet. She stated to feel some pressure, when Alan pushed her out of his butt, having her land with a plop in the toilet. Alan got up, looked in the toilet, and found Alex. She was furious.
“Why did you leave me in your belly?” She yelled, “I smell disgusting! How dare you!?” Alan said, “Your our now right? And we can wash out the stench.” Alex said back “Alan, I’m a literal piece of your crap. You can’t wash crap. I’ll smell like this forever!” Alex thought for a minute and
122121222.title: You'll get out tomorrow

122122.content: Another place on the body
122122.title: Another Region

1222.content: Alex stumble off Alan's shoulder, falling in front of him. What will she do? Alex...
1222.title: Before you can answer, you fall off Alan's ...

choices: Ian looks up and notices her...(woops!)
Something shakes the walkways and Alex falls...
Alex tries to lean further over the edge and get a better sight...
123.content:
Alex sighed as she exited from a little tunnel high up in the locker rooms - where she had the privacy of changing for gym class when time came. Sometimes she purposely took a different path so she could catch a glimpse of the cute boys from her gym class, most notably of which being her crush, Ian.

While the girl's gym did volleyball, the boy's classes did soccer. She laid flat on her stomach, pressing her breasts against the lazily constructed wooden walkways. She looked down below her to see her love - Ian, changing after a soccer game between the mini teams constructed from his class.
123.title: A Locker Room Adventure

choices: In his mouth as he yawns
1233.content:
Alex leaned over edge further, fully enamoured by the giant boy. Her heart was racing. Not paying attention, she pushed herself to far over the edge and slipped off. She was hurtling through the air, plummeting down in the vicinity of Ian. She realised what was happening and tried to veer towards him as best she could, falling down to Ian's colossal body.

Where on Ian does she land?
1233.title: Crashing on her Crush

12332.content: She eventually hit what she thought to be thr ground. There was a very bad smell here. She looked arround and realized that... She fell inside his practice shoes. She tried calling for help but he couldnt hear her. She started to see his socked foot into view. She knew if she wanted to survive she would need to run to the toe section. Does she make it?
12332.title: In his shoe

124.content:
"I hate this." You stated with crossed arms.

"C'mon, she looks up to you. Metaphorically speaking of course. Just spend a few hours with her this afternoon, you'll be done in a jiff."

"No I won't. What if I end up stuck to her sole and she forgets about me again?"

"Then you do what you always do."

"Panic and hope I don't die as but a mere crushed microbe under a thirteen year old girl's foot?"

"No. You first see if you can get out of it, then try to contact her by any means, and if you have it, your emergency phone. Which I hope isn't broken again." Calpernia said with a raised brow.

"I get tossed around a lot, and it's not exactly durable!" You retort up to your enormous guardian who had just blown out a countryside's worth of haze from her cigarette.

"Fine. We'll get you a new one..." She sighed, getting up and leaving you on the table. "Be good to Saturday, okay Alex? If you can make it through this, I'll try to get you that cute dress you've been looking at made."

You peaked up slightly. "...The one with the frills?"

"I'm sure we can find it in a size negative million."

"...You're the best Cal."

"I know." She snickered, heading inside and leaving you to wait for your teenage tormentor to arrive. You could feel her approach, every step booming and ominous. Eventually you spotted her off in the distance, even so far away she appeared godlike in stature, not even a teenager at all, clad in nothing but a tight tee and short shorts. Jeez, what were kids wearing these days?

"ALLLLLLEEEEEXXXXXXXX!!!" She squealed, somehow spotting your miniature mite of a self even from so far away. Girl had sharp senses. "Okay, okay, okay," She stammered upon approach, too giddy for her own good. "Today I was thinking, just WHAT IF-"
124.title: Not Looking Forward to Saturdays

1241.content:
"Today I was thinking, just WHAT IF... If I ate you!" she blurted out with a nervous giggle.

You had no words to react with. Of all things she had ever said or done, this one had rendered you utterly speechless. Staring wide-eyed at her impossibly gigantic form, you struggled to form a coherent word. "Uh...w-what?"

"Just think about it. You’re so small it’d be like a great adventure inside the human body! Like, can you imagine what it would be like inside my belly?” she said, placing one hand over her stomach.

“Uhh… yeah! Full of deadly acids, completely gross, really hot and probably stinky too! I am so not okay with this!” Your protests fall on deaf ears as Saturday just leans in closer. A huge and sinister smirk spread across her gargantuan face. “Oh yeah? And what exactly are you gonna do about it pipsqueak? We’re doing this and there’s nothing you can do to stop me. Besides, it’ll be fun! Going on an epic journey inside my body, exploring my insides, going where nobody has ever been before. And you’d probably come out okay on the other end.”

“Wait what? No way! No, this is crazy. It’s not funny any more Saturday, quit talking about it.”

Saturday smiled. “Sure. I’ll quit talking.” Suddenly her hand reached over and formed a massive wall on the table behind you. The wall started to move at an alarming rate as she tried to sweep you from the table and onto her hand. At this size though, she was more likely to crush you with her giant hand. Not wanting to be bulldozed to oblivion, you ran as fast as you could to the edge of the table and leapt off just as Saturday’s hand almost reached you. You landed with a soft thud in her other hand, which was waiting at the edge of the table to catch you. As you struggled to regain your bearings, there was a strange feeling like being on a plane during take-off. Saturday’s hand rose up to face level as she stood her full height.

In front of you, across the fleshy plains of her palm, your field of vision was filled by her mouth, which currently formed a giddily excited grin. “Well Alex, I hope you have fun inside me! Bon appetite!”

Her mouth opened wide, giving you a view inside the enormous cavern as her warm breath washed over you. Things started to get real when her hand tilted, forcing you to slide down and into her mouth. The descent was fast and you landed with a wet splat on Saturday’s tongue. Darkness shrouded the area as Saturday closed her mouth, trapping your minuscule self inside. You stood slowly, finding it difficult to adjust to the soft and bumpy surface of her tongue. Your eyes began to slowly adjust to the darkness inside the cavern, but it was still difficult to make out whereabouts you were due to your insanely tiny size and the lack of light.

“Okay Alex… don’t panic… you’re in Saturday’s mouth… It’s not the worst situation in the world… just keep calm and try to look for a way out…”
1241.title: "...If I ate you!"

12411.content:
You tried to stay calm in the darkness, but it was hard to get your bearings. You started to move, walking across Saturday's massive tongue before realising you might be wandering further inside of her. Maybe it would best to let your eyes adjust first? Things became clearer after a while. It seemed you were pretty much in the middle of Saturday's tongue.

The floor began to move and you suddenly found yourself being whisked away toward the gaping black hole that was Saturday's throat. She was preparing to swallow you...

You could do nothing to stop it. You slid down into her gullet, completely engulfed by the crazed teen. With a loud gulp, you were gone. So began your journey to the centre of Saturday, a journey you weren't looking forward to. You had passed the point of no return and knew that the only way out of Saturday's body now was to let nature run its course. Just thinking about that made you shudder as you plummeted down her gullet.

Falling through the spacious (to you) esophagus, you could hear the trickling of saliva and the mighty beating of Saturday's heart. It was beating fast, probably because of the adrenaline rush Saturday was likely experiencing from having swallowed you whole. She was likely giddy with excitement, thinking about your fantastic voyage into her body.

Falling further still, the heartbeat became more distant and instead you could hear a guttural groaning from down below. That must be Saturday's stomach gurgling, you thought. A few more seconds and you would be inside it.

You passed through the cardia and were hit with the foul stench of Saturday's digesting breakfast. The horrible warmth in her stomach was oppressive as you fell further, before splashing insignificantly into the stomach sea. Surfacing quickly, you found yourself afloat in a vast ocean of who knows what. You'd arrived at last in Saturday's belly. Gross.

Looking around, you could see the remnants of Saturday's breakfast floating in there with you. Thankfully you weren't being digested by Saturday's stomach acids, which you kind of surmised based on your enhanced durability from being so damn small. Still, it didn't make being in Saturday's belly any better. It was disgusting and you wanted out. Who knows how long that'd take.

Saturday's stomach was immeasurably big. You could kind of make out the fleshy walls in the distance, pulsing and undulating with life as the stomach churned. You could still make out the beating of Saturday's heart, the pace still slightly accelerated. You wondered what the hell she might be doing out there. She was probably rubbing her belly, a huge grin plastered on her face as she relished in eating you.

The stomach would groan and gurgle often, but a particularly loud and prolonged series of gastric noises signalled something big as Saturday's tummy rumbled.
12411.title: Journey to Saturday's Stomach

124111.content: Saturday was eating lunch. As her food started to come down into the stomach, Alex realized what she was eating
124111.title: She's hungry (Saturday eats lunch)

1241112.content: Alex looked at the food and realized it was..
1241112.title: A sandwich

choices: Going on a bike ride with me!
Hanging out back at my house
Joining me for a beach day!
1242.content:
"WHAT?" Alex replied in disbelief. Sure she had been crushed under this girl's feet more times than she cared to name, but being pinned under her enormous posterior would certainly be a new experience. Not to mention that Saturday was being awfully forward about her intentions. Usually she at least pretended what she did was an accident.

"Yeah I was just thinking 'If Alex feels so good under my feet, she would probably feel great under my butt too!'" Saturday replied, grinning from ear to ear.

Alex could hardly believe how casually this girl was talking about crushing her beneath her butt. Alex knew she was powerless to stop the girl from having her way with her, especially since Alex was already on the couch in the prime position to be sat on."Saturday please reconsider. You have no idea how unpleasant it is for me to get squished under you like that." Alex entreated, hoping to appeal to some sense of decency within the young girl.

Unfortunately, she had no such luck. "And you have no idea how good it feels to squish you! Besides, it's not like you actually get crushed. And who knows, you might even enjoy my butt!" Saturday replied, turning her back to the tiny girl, effectively ending the conversation.

Alex knew she had no chance of escape as the jean clad ass of the giant 13 year old came plummeting towards her. Resigned to her fate, she allowed herself to fall down onto her back, hoping at least to find the least unpleasant position to be squashed in. Being stepped on countless times had taught her that impacts that compress the spine vertically always proved more painful.

As Saturday's enormous posterior struck the tiny girl, she found herself pinned beneath the rough denim surface that covered the giant girl's right butt cheek. The material scratched her skin as Saturday slid into place on top of her, giving her a number of small cuts and bruises but as always doing no permanent damage. From Alex's tiny perspective, every tiny movement and shift of Saturday's weight was like an earthquake.

"Come on Alex I can barely even feel you under there! You're supposed to make my seat comfier!" Saturday squealed, impatient. She began to lightly bounce in her seat on top of the girl, trying to motivate the girl to be "comfy" for her, as though that were something Alex could consciously decide to do.

info.brief_description: A small person, a small story.
info.description:
----------
Story
----------

How would one even describe this scale of small? Centimeters? No, far too large. Millimeters? Closer, but not by much. Micrometers, even to say as drastic as Picometers to describe such feats of teeniness and tininess. Two twins were born one day, their mother passing quickly after, leaving them to the world. One is normal, another not so much but miraculously found at their puny scale. Yet, strangely, seemingly in another scenario it's the same setting, but reversed, one twin big yet the other small. Either way, it's going to be a small life.

----------
Synopsis
----------

Really just another interactive of extremely small scale mega-micro along the lines of my 'Your Life Smaller', I just can't get enough of it! However, this story is fairly different and personal to me, since most of it and it's characters are partially based off of myself and people I've known in real life. I've just needed an outlet, and this helps, given how I would like to think of myself. It's really, really dumb, and I'm just gushing, but I just like to think of myself as somebody with a small soul, and this is a good way to express it.

----------
Characters
----------

Name: Alan Smallson
Age: 18
Gender: Male
Personality: Actually fairly optimistic given how small he is, and tries to be kind to everyone. Does tend to be naive about things, but hey, what can you do?
Appearance: Average build, lithe and slightly athletic. Caucasian. Has brown hair, cut into a mohawk, but usually wears it down instead of up. Gotta have those rebellious years while they last.
Bio: Born less than a millimeter tall, Alan is the smallest of the small, the world far too large to understand an even a person like some great astronomical being. But hey, it's a small life, and he'll live it.

Name: Alex (Alexis) Smallson
Age: 18
Gender: Female
Personality: Headstrong, bold and brave, ready to take on the world if it wasn't for her height. Of course has her shy moments, but being this small gives a complex, no?
Appearance: Fit and lean with a curvy body, but she can't show it off. Brown hair, normally tied back into a bun.
Bio:Born less than a millimeter tall, Alex is the smallest of the small, the world far too large to understand an even a person like some great astronomical being. But hey, it's a small life, and she'll live it.


Note: Depending which main character you pick determines who you will be able to interact with.


For Alan:

Name: Calpernia Monell
Age: 42
Gender: Female
Personality: A bit on the rough side, but has a heart of gold under that tough exterior and a soft spot for her tiny tenants. Takes no bullshit, and when she gives it she makes sure its sent to the right place.
Appearance: (This should generally help get a good definition base of how she lookshttp://nyom87.deviantart.com/art/Vue-giantess-14-312046696, with this http://nyom87.deviantart.com/art/Naughty-evening-Page-114-443670745 and this http://nyom87.deviantart.com/art/Naughty-evening-Page-112-443670456 helping) Stands as a tower of a woman at 6'8, with hefty jugs that seem to defy the bra cup system and are simply labeled as 'huge', like two fleshy round orbs that seem to bounce and protrude from her body, almost outsizing an average person's entire torso. How this woman even exists is unreal. Has fair caucasian skin, a bit on the lighter side and showing signs of age lines, but she handles it incredibly well and looks great. Has bleached blonde hair cut short, and is usually messy.
Bio: Originally a nurse, one who helped deliver the twins, but was surprised to find the tiny one. Quit after that, finding it too weird, but upon hearing that the Smallson's mother died shortly after birth she had become their caretaker. She's fairly good with taking care of them, if she wasn't so tough sometimes, and she should really quit that nasty smoking habit of hers.
(Fun side note, her voiceclaim is Jennifer Hale.)

Name: Tessa Mac'Tir
Age: 18
Gender: Female
Personality: Incredibly shy, hardly saying a peep to most, but is incredibly kind and sweet.
Appearance: Small, standing hardly 4'9, the definition of a shortstack. Slightly chubby, but her bust and butt are hardly something to scoff at, fairly huge in comparison, almost too big to be on her shorter body. Of course to Alan she's still as godly titanic as the rest of the world. Pale, almost ghostly white skin, but it's smooth. Has tons of cute freckles across her face and cheeks to match her short cut-bob fiery red ginger hair. Likes to wear fairly simple clothing, like tees and shorts with flip-flops.
Bio: One of Alan's closest friends, and a girl who has a heavy, heavy crush on him. Alan does have a crush on her as well, which he likely does on most of his female friends, but this one he would actually like to return. For now, they're really just good friends, too afraid to say anything.

Name: Alice Lees
Age: 18
Gender: Female
Personality: Extremely optimistic, and surprisingly cheery to boot. This is somewhat offset by her lewd personality and flirty ways.
Appearance: Mid-sized height around 5'5-5'6, but with plenty of heft in her curves and 39DD bust, her large butt almost comparable to Tessa's, but still outsized by the ginger's stocky big round one. Dark, ebony skin, almost fairly black in regards. Has dark brown hair, and sometimes wears glasses.
Bio: Another friend in Alan's circle, much more likely to tease him and take advantage of his size.

Name: Hayes Gray
Age: 17
Gender: Female
Personality: Bubbly, eager, but a bit on the snarky side.
Appearance: Thin and lithe, in a wiry, cutesy way with nice slight curves. Takes on more of an 'emo' appearance with black bangs over her eyes, a streak of red in her hair, belaying her semi-sweet personality, with plenty of piercings over her face and ears. Normally wears black, with boots and red plaid to complete the look. Around a B-cup chest.
Bio: A close friend of Alan. Their relationship is normally fake play-flirting, and some powing around.


For Alex:

Name: Nathalie Mckissick
Age: 33
Gender: Female
Personality: Stern when it comes to teaching her students, but surprisingly laid-back and very chill, giving off one of those 'arty-hippie' vibes.
Appearance: Mid-sized height and a decent body for a woman her age, D-cup chest and average form. Has black, straight hair to around the midpoint of her neck and always wears a big smile. Usually wears paint-stained clothing and smocks.
Bio: An art teacher at the local high school who's become somewhat of a protector/mentor for Alex.

Name: Saturday Jones
Age: 13
Gender: Female
Personality: Always chipper, but has a mean streak if she doesn't get her way. She's just beginning to mature, but that doesn't mean she won't resort to childish ways.
Appearance: (Partially based off of http://www.deviantart.com/art/Soft-skin-to-climb-516459793 and http://super-ego.deviantart.com/art/towering-colossus-513508961) Fair and lean, but with a budding figure for her age. Saturday has a mass of curly black hair she likes to keep together in a ponytail.
Bio: A neighbor to the Smallsons and constantly amazed by their tiny stature, particularly taking an interest in Alex. While her intrigue is tended to goodwill, her ambition is incredibly unwelcome. She's not very gentle with handling the tiny girl, and always ends up losing her or ending up 'playing' with her on 'accident', as she does it giggling.

Name: Aoi Higashi
Age: 18
Gender: Female
Personality: Holds and intelligent air about her, and with good reason for her near perfect GPA and wide array of knowledge in many subjects. Comes off as cold sometimes, but really she hardly opens up unless it's to people she knows.
Appearance: (Sort of like http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7130/7426097460_18b954127b_c.jpg)
Bio: Alex's best friend, having met her early on in school and grew up together, never really parting. Aoi is a top of the class student, her family coming to the states in an attempt for a better life for them and Aoi. While she may seem quiet and stoic, she seems to enjoy the fact her friend is so small, almost...lording it over her. As they spend time together, it isn't made a secret that Aoi sort of harbors feelings for Alex, tossing casual comments and flirting the tiny gal's way, which she hopes are reciprocated one day.

Name: Ian Chrise
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Personality: Pretty preppy, but a nice enough guy.
Appearance: Tall, fair, dark-haired and handsome.
Bio: Alex's crush , but hardly notices her, really having only spoken to her a couple times, so she views this titan from afar with a romantic sigh.
